1.content:
You are sitting in your armchair squarely in front of the TV playing your Xbox 360 (Play station 3 or Wii if you prefer), enjoying your end of year holidays and the alone time you currently have.

Your parents have left you to your own devices and gone overseas. That gives you all the time you want to play….
1.title: Relaxing

11.content:
Street Fighter 4 was your game of choice. You were playing really well and relaxed as your character pulled of a super move on Cammy. The crushing force of the move would have snapped her neck but the game was over and you had won.

Because you knew you were alone you pulled out a few different win poses yourself in the real world. Posing to nothing in particular just placing an over importance on your video game victory.

Suddenly out of no where an unknown force struck you in the back sending you flying and landing flat on your face. You roll over and are shocked to see Cammy standing in front of your TV ready to fight you.

“Wow this is new. What do you want?” you asked Cammy
“You’re coming with me. We can do this the easy way or the hard way.” Cammy said

Seeing Cammy standing in front of you with her green one piece bathing suit declaring that you had to come with her made you laugh.
“You can’t take me anywhere love” You said smiling

Cammy smiled “let’s go then”

With that she attacked you. Cammy spear tackled you to the ground; she landed on top of you. You lifted her firm body off you and rolled away. Cammy crouched a few feet away from you, like a cat ready to pounce.
You raised you hands defensively “Now let’s not b-“
You don’t get a chance to finish Cammy leaped towards you her legs closed around the sides of you head smooching your face into her butt and crotch. Cammy flipped over and brought your body with her. With a crash you body hit the floor and pain ran up your spine. Cammy didn’t relent though she applied more pressure to your neck with her legs.

You were slowly chocking, your hands banged uselessly on her strong legs. From under her butt Cammy observed your chocking face with a merciless expression on her face.

When you were about to pass out Cammy flipped your body like a doll and threw you into the TV.
You into the screen and disappeared into the world of Street Fighter. You fly into….
11.title: Street Fighter 4

choices: does Cammy find you and squish you with her feet and you die under her feet
or does Cammy still squish you but you live as a foot slave
112.content: well you were flying into Cammy's giant foot and you were caught in the middle of her foot and you tried to get off of her foot but it was useless you were stuck to Cammy's foot like a piece of gum and Cammy Slams her giant foot down and mashes you under her foot and every step she takes is painful to you well the pain gets worse when Cammy gets home she peels you off of her foot and throws you down on the carpet in her living room and says well who is the bigger one now and Cammy chalenges you to fight her now and you were ready to fight her again but this one was real and she came at you with her spear in hand but you dodged it but she swung her left foot and knocked you to the ground you lost 25 GP of your health but you regained it by eating a fruit and you did a triple body slam on Cammy and she was knocked out of the fight and you won the match and Cammy woke up and squished you under her bare foot and she popped you with her toes and you came back to life and you ran away from Cammy's giant feet.
112.title: Cammy's giant foot

12.content: Choose a created or character of make your own.
12.title: Mortal Kombat 2011

choices: He actually doesn't get his ass kicked!
121.content:
"Hell Yeah! Mortal Kombat!" Said our protagonist Jack Gilberg who had just gotten The newest Mortal Kombat game for his badass HyperScan system. "Can't believe I got the game for 10$ bucks new from that creepy old man from the antique store!" After placing the disk in the console Jack got ready to power the console on. "Alright lets go!" He said pressing the power button as the console began to glow and smoke began to surround Jack. "What the hell? What's going o-?" Before he could finish the light from the system got so bright it blinded him.

When the light faded Jack opened his eyes and found himself in a strange temple of sorts the beginning of the games story mode. He looked up as Reptile crashed into the floor infront of him as Johnny Cage his favorite character cheered. "Alright I am such a badass! I need a drink." Cage said walking over to Raiden.

"Hey Asian guy where's the bar around here?"
"You can't leave now you have another match right now!"
"Yeah yeah, whatever but where is the bar."
"It's right over there" Raiden said pointing to his left " but, you must-"
"Thanks." Cage said ignoring the Thunder god.

Lui Kang came up to Raiden. "Master as much of a idiot that guy was we need someone to go fight for earth realm!"
"Crap I know Lui Kang!" Raiden said looking around spotting Jack poking at Reptile's body. "You, how would like to fight for Earthrealms fate?" Jack looked up dumbfounded.

"I don't think I'm qualified to-"
"Great go get fight that guy with swords for hands!" Raiden said throwing Jack into the ring.

Shang Tsang stood up to announce the next fight. "Now the next match will begin! Reptile vs" Shang stopped and looked at Jack.
"What's your name?"
"Jack Gilberg."
"Stupid name, Reptile vs Jack Gilberg! Moral Kombat!"

Barraka walked up extending his blades. "I will rip out your organs and make you drown in your blood!" Jack jumped back in terror "Oh sh-!"

How does Jack do in the fight?
121.title: The mighty Jack Gilberg

choices: Into a battle field facing Ivy
13.content:
You’re playing Soul Calibur 4. You are having trouble mastering the controls which is making the game hard at the moment.
You play reasonably helplessly as Sophitia smashes your character from one end of the screen to the other. Finally manage to block an attack, only for Sophitia to jump up onto your shoulders, twist her body one way which would break your character’s neck before she did and back flip and threw your character to the ground. Your character screamed as her knees crushed his face. K.O appeared on the screen, followed by a YOU LOSE.

You left the match and chose to fight a different opponent. You selected Ivy. Apparently the big boobed woman had an ability that made her do more damage to males.
This game was going better for you. The game announced FINAL ROUND with you and Ivy tied at 4 rounds each. This round went very badly for you. First Ivy launched into a fury of blows with her whip which all connected because you were to slow to block. With your character lying of the ground Ivy stomped him with her heel. You rolled away only to have Ivy grab you and pull you over with her whip.

This is when your character disappeared off the screen. “What the hell?” you said.
Ivy was looking around as well, as if she was real. Then she looked right at you.

“Curse you fate for running into me” she said to you.
Ivy leaped out of the TV and into the room. She appeared standing right in front of you, a fully grown woman with massive breasts ready for battle.
“OK” You said slowly as you stood up.
You were the same height as Ivy, but judging by the size of her breasts and thighs she would weight more than you.

In a lighting hit Ivy punched you in the jaw, the blow knocked you back down onto the chair.
“Ow fuck!” you yelled
Sitting down you were face to bellybutton with Ivy.
“Stay down” ordered Ivy
“No! You’re just a video game character” you said standing up, angry now

Without warning Ivy knees you in the stomach you double over coughing Ivy stepped back and kicked you in the face. You hit the floor hard head spinning and winded Ivy walked over to you. She lifted her foot smiling and stepped on your chest then she twisted her foot, grinding it down onto your ribcage.

Ivy forced you onto your feet and then threw you into your TV.
As your body disappeared into the screen and the world of Soul Calibur a voice said “what lies with in your soul?”

You fly through the void between worlds and come out…
13.title: What's in your soul?

choices: Yes... but barely you have a TOUGH fight ahead of you.
No... you are getting shredded.  She starts to toy with you and abuse you.
131.content:
You flew into the arena and landed with a thud. Somehow you are not killed from the fall, heck it seems you were barely bruised.

Of course Ivy was right there with her sword whip in hand.

She smirks at you, "I told you to stay down, for your refusal I've brought you to my world."

What the hell you think to yourself. This can't be happening. But it is and you realize that Ivy is circling you and is making ready to strike. You get up and says, "Hey I don't want to fight you can't we talk about this?"

Ivy's sword twists into a whip and she lashes out at you. Time seems to slow and you dodge aside the whip at the very last second. Your reflexes seem to have been enhanced as well. Filled with renewed confidence at your quick dodge you crack your knuckles and says, "All right bitch, lets see what you got."

With a roar that shocks her you sprint toward her full speed. Her whip lashes out and you roll underneath it and deliver a devastating blow to her sexy stomach. She is rocked by the blow but her abs may be shapely but they have strength behind them. She dries to smash your head with the hilt of her blade due to you being inside her guard. You react quickly and grab her arm and use her own forward momentum to roll backwards and toss her 15 feet away.

You chuckle. She wasn't so tough. Well you spoke too soon. Her whip was already lashing out even as she was falling and before you realize it, its grabbed you by the ankle and you are ripped off of your feet. You land hard on the arena floor, again not as damaging as you thought it would be but the wind is temporarily knocked out of you.

As you lay on your back Ivy starts to lash out with her whip in rapid succession. Can you survive her powerful attacks?
131.title: Into a battle field facing Ivy

choices: YES!  You get a second wind and fight back!
Yes, another female fighter steps in and fights Ivy!
1312.content:
You try to block the whip strikes but even if they just lash your arms they are incredibly painful. You scream out in agony your concentration broken and the whip strikes become a blur, slashing skin off your arms, chest and twice across your face.

"You are weak," she taunts as you vainly try to stand up and stop the punishment.

After another agonizing dozen strikes she pauses and stalks forward. Your breathing heavily and bleeding from several wounds. She contemptuously kicks out with her high heeled foot catching you in the face. Her whip turns into a blade and she presses her heel onto your head pinning you down.

"You will not die here dog. When I 'slay' you, you're soul will be bound to me forever. You will worship my feet, licking the sweat off of them after every match. I will use you as a human punching bag. You will be my slave for eternity!

This horrible fate was about to befall you, can anything save you from it?
1312.title: No... you are getting shredded.  She starts to ...

132.content:
As you fly into the TV screen, you feel yourself loosing consciousness. When you finally awaken from the shocking situation, you feel as though something is off. You try to move your arms, but you find that your arms are pinned helplessly against your sides. Looking around at your current situation, you see that you are trapped between two massive flesh-colored mountains. Struggling to free your arms, you soon hear a feminine giggle emanate from above your head.

It is at this point that you begin to grasp the reality of your situation: the fleshy mountains around your body are actually a massive pair of breasts! It would seem that you have somehow been shrunken, and you were now being held captive inside the cleavage of a fairly well endowed female. Before you could even think to react to this, you find yourself being gripped between two massive fingers and plucked out of the 'booby trap' that you were caught in. As the enormous woman lifted you up to her face, you immediately recognized your captress as none other than...
132.title: Shrunken in SoulCalibur4?!

choices: Ivy gets he ass kicked and you shrink with her
Algol loses and shrinks to be squished
1321.content:
Ivy-Looks like you want to join me in my battle Algol.
You-What
Algol-So you want to fight me but you will never win
1321.title: Ivy's Breasts

1323.content: Who is this massive girl that is now holding you?
1323.title: Who else?

13233.content: How about Talim or Seong Mi-na
13233.title: more choices

choices: The House of the Dead Overkill
14.title: Other Game

15.content:
Those games were all well and good, but the fact DOA wasn't on there is possibly criminal.

What else do we have in the ollll cabinet?
15.title: the obligatory "More games" chapter

1553.content: this might take a while
1553.title: Something else

info.brief_description: Try and surrive being forced into a video game around violent and sometimes huge women.
info.description:
You are a fit young 18 year old male. You are home for the holidays by yourself because you parents are away.
While playing a video game, the character on the screen comes out and attacks you. You get sucked into the game.
You are forced to survive in the game world and try and find a way back to the real world.

Rules:
1. Second person view point (you)
2. I will allow shrinking and giantesses, but you are the only male
3. You can still have a normal sized story
4. I will allow sex and the like, but no toilet related stuff
5. You can exist in various states of inviolability or you can be normal
6. Make an effort with your spelling and try to make your additions as detailed as possible
7. It’s ok if you want to “finish” off the main character just make sure the last chapter is good and comes after a decent story

This is my first real attempt at a story so I appreciate feedback and would love lots of additions.
